name: Orphanage
details: Your parents died or abandoned you when you were a young child. You may have had to engage in petty crime or low-wage work to earn your crumbs. [+4 Feat of Defiance]

name: Farm
details: Your family was common farmers or serfs, working the land to scratch a living. You were poor, but the village was a joyous, tight-knit place, and it was honest hard work. [+4 Animal Husbandry]

name: Frontier
details: You were born to a band of foresters, explorers, or colonists and have seldom witnessed or experienced civilization. Most things you had or ate were of the land, hunted or gathered. [+4 Forage]

name: Ship
details: You were born on the seas or rivers, and feel more at home with water, rather than land, under your feet. Your family may have been in a navy, merchant fleet, or pirate crew. [+4 Navigate]

name: Travelling Caravan
details: Your parents were caravaneers, whether as travelling entertainers, pilgrims, or merchants. You’ve seldom stayed in one place for longer than a phase, and thus, those you trust, made friends with, or fell in love with were of the band alone. [+4 Identify]

name: Guild Hall
details: The Guild was your family as much as your parents were. This could be a mercantile guild, a martial company, or a criminal organization. Loyalty and keeping secrets still make a place in the back of your mind. [+4 Trade]

name: Workshop
details: Your parents were tinkerers or artisans. From the time you could walk or talk, you helped them with their crafts and trades. [+4 Craft]

name: Cloth
details: Your family was clergy or religious leaders of your community. You focused on the study of the divine and the stories of your religion more than on history, politics, or local customs. [+4 Divine Intervention]

name: Congregation
details: Your family was at your local church, temple, or shrine as often as they were at work or in bed. You learned piety and austerity above all other worldly wants. [+4 Worship]

name: Streets
details: You grew up in a criminal organization that your family belonged to. They may have been scammers or serious criminals, or perhaps even a rebel or bandit army, but either way, you still trust criminals more than the authorities. [+4 Conceal]

name: Stage
details: Your parents were entertainers, perhaps bards, circus performers, or stage actors. Their knack for theatre and high energy rubbed off on you, and with those, a sense for reading any crowd. [+4 Perform]

name: Warehouse
details: Your family was common laborers or serfs, scraping together coins for rent in a city or large town. You were poor, but you made many friends, allies, and rivals, and enjoyed the amenities of an urban population center. [+4 Interpret]

name: Battlefield
details: You were born on campaign, among the camp followers. Your parents may have been warriors themselves, or support staff and servants. You seldom knew naught but war and internal military politics. [+4 Battle]

name: University
details: Your parents were scholars, obsessed with their studies, tomes, and experiments. They imparted what knowledge they had time to give unto you, as well as a healthy respect for education and educators. [+4 Academic Recall]

name: Palace
details: You belong to a line of nobles, whether high or lowly. You lived a cushy and privileged life, even if belonging to a minor house, but a cold and lonely one. Palace intrigue cuts one off from even one’s own family and friends. [+4 Deceive]

name: Kidnapped
details: You were taken from your home at a young age, whether to be sold into slavery, used for ransom, or for fouler purposes. [+4 Persevere, -4 Interpret]

name: Apprenticed
details: You learned how to perform basic tasks related to a craft or trade under a trusted member of your community. [+4 Craft, -4 Deceive]

name: Bullied
details: You were relentlessly picked on or ostracized as a loner. [+4 Endure, -4 Parley]

name: Bad Habits
details: You picked up a bad habit you’ve never been able to shake. [+4 Conceal, -4 Feat of Austerity]

name: Served Priest
details: You entered into service under a member of the clergy in your community, intending to become a member of the clergy yourself. [+4 Worship, -4 deceive]

name: Pet
details: You have a favorite pet that you’ve been raising since you were young. [+4 Animal Husbandry, -4 Conceal]

name: Explored
details: You found yourself oftentimes far from home, searching around and mapping out your local area. [+4 Navigate, -4 Interpret]

name: Fought
details: You were always getting into fights and disputes. [+4 Battle, -4 Parley]

name: Petty Crime
details: You engaged in small-time crime, whether out of desperation or boredom. [+4 Feat of Agility, -4 academic recall]

name: Worked
details: When you could walk and talk, your family put you to work with the family trade. [+4 Endure, -4 Deceive]

name: Easy Money
details: You found a way to make quick cash, whether through trickery or genius. [+4 Trade, -4 Divine Intervention]

name: Cursed
details: You were cursed by a supernatural entity or religious organization. [+4 Sense Supernatural, -4 Resist Supernatural]

name: Blessed
details: You were blessed by a supernatural entity or religious organization. [+4 Worship, -4 Incite Fate]

name: Revelatory Secret
details: You discovered something of grave importance not meant for you to know and still carry the secret. [+4 Interpret, -4 Deduce]

name: Got Away With It
details: You did something horrible and nobody but you knows. [+8 Deceive, -4 Worship]

name: Learned a Trade
details: You learned how to perform advanced tasks related to a craft or trade under a trusted member of your community. [+8 Craft, -4 Deceive]

name: Fell in Love
details: You became romantically or sexually infatuated or involved with someone, and this may be a prior or current relationship, or entirely unrequited. [+8 Feat of Defiance, -4 Seduce]

name: Witnessed Battles
details: Your homeland became war-torn, and you survived the carnage and aftermath of a major conflict. [+8 Battle, -4 Academic Recall]

name: Athlete
details: You trained your body to participate in contests, tournaments, and festival events within your community. [+8 Feat of Strength, -4 Academic Recall]

name: Studied
details: You studied under a teacher or at a college. [+8 Academic Recall, -4 Seduce]

name: Picked Up A Hobby
details: You engaged with a serious hobby, game, or interest that you still enjoy from time to time. [+8 Perform, -4 Academic Recall]

name: Journeyed
details: You moved a far distance to a new home and made it your own. [+8 Translate, -4 Interpret]

name: Contacted Supernatural
details: You communed with or summoned a supernatural entity. [+8 Worship, -4 Incite Fate]

name: Historian
startingEquipment: 10 historical tomes, 5 region maps, 3 city maps, 2 site maps, organization signifier
feature: Your character has access to various private libraries and museums that allow you to study or temporarily borrow ancient books and relics.

name: Scientist
startingEquipment: 10 natural sciences tomes, a magnifying glass, chemistry tools, and an organization signifier
feature: Your character has access to private libraries and laboratories that allow you to study or create various curiosities, substances, and anomalies. Starting Wealth

name: Litigator
startingEquipment: 10 legal tomes, a set of fine clothes, organization signifier
feature: Your character has access to higher-ups and records in courts.

name: Philosopher
startingEquipment: 2 friends, organization signifier
feature: You have numerous adherents in many settlements and regions who may offer shelter or help.

name: Doctor
startingEquipment: Medical tools, 10 medical tomes, 10 antidotes, 1 poison, organization signifier
feature: Your character has access to hospitals and clinics, and their records. May perform surgeries.

name: Rhetorician
startingEquipment: Set of fine clothes, organization signifier
feature: When debating in public, large crowds gather around.

name: Courtier
startingEquipment: Carriage, 2 horses, 2 bodyguards, 2 servants, writ, organization signifier, 3 sets of fine clothes, 1 poison, 1 antidote
feature: You have private access to individuals who are higher-ups in politics.

name: Spy
startingEquipment: Disguise tools, small weapon of choice, spyglass, lockpicking tools, horse, 3 forged organization signifiers, 3 forged writs, cloak, set of fine clothes
feature: You belong to a network of spies and informants that you may access for information.

name: Order Representative
startingEquipment: Horse or pack mule, weapon of choice, light armor, set of fine clothes, 1 potion, organization signifier
feature: You belong to an organization that will lend you supplies if you are in significant peril.

name: Assassin
startingEquipment: Disguise tools, spyglass, poison tools, 3 poisons, 1 antidote, 2 small weapons of choice, 1 ranged weapon of choice, forged writ, forged organization signifier, cloak
feature: You have access to secret safehouses in various cities and regions where law enforcement will not find you.

name: Diplomat
startingEquipment: Carriage, 2 horses, 1 servant, 2 bodyguards, small or medium weapon of choice, writ, organization signifier, set of fine clothes
feature: You have the ability to gain public access to political rulers and powerful leaders.

name: Strategist
startingEquipment: Horse, 2 bodyguards, weapon of choice, era and race appropriate armor, organization signifier
feature: You have the ability to gain public access to military leaders.

name: Smith
startingEquipment: Smithing tools, a small blunt weapon
feature: You can produce metal goods.

name: Carpenter
startingEquipment: Carpentry tools, measuring tools
feature: You can produce wood goods.

name: Tinkerer
startingEquipment: Tinkering tools, 3 precious gems, magnifying glass
feature: You can produce intricate goods.

name: Engineer
startingEquipment: Tool set of choice, measuring tools
feature: You can design and construct large crafts and items.

name: Mason
startingEquipment: Masonry tools, measuring tools
feature: You can produce stone goods.

name: Lightkeeper
startingEquipment: Chemistry tools, 10 lights of choice, packmule
feature: You can produce lights and basic potions.

name: Troubadour
startingEquipment: 2 instruments of choice, a horse, 1 region map, 1 friend, weapon of choice, a set of fine clothes
feature: You may entertain and network at high-end parties you are not affiliated with.

name: War Hero
startingEquipment: 2 weapons of choice, era and race appropriate armor, organization signifier
feature: There are military organizations that will aid you if you are in peril.

name: Folk Hero
startingEquipment: 1 weapon of choice, packmule, 1 friend
feature: Common people will offer you shelter and supplies as you travel.

name: Saint
startingEquipment: Organization signifier, clergy robes, staff, 1 artifact, religious or ideological tome, 2 servants, 3 antidotes
feature: Religious organizations will aid you if you are in peril. +30 Deity Relationship Points.

name: Relative
startingEquipment: Tent, horse, packmule, 1 servant, 1 bodyguard, set of fine clothes
feature: You have a powerful relative who you can obtain money or aid from.

name: Debutante/Suitor
startingEquipment: Carriage, 2 horses, 2 servants, 1 bodyguard, 3 sets of fine clothes
feature: You have private and public access to higher echelons of society for the purpose of courting.

name: Con Artist
startingEquipment: Set of fine clothes, 3 joke items, 3 forged organization signifiers
feature: There are many people who are convinced that your products are real.

name: Gambler
startingEquipment: 2 games of choice
feature: You can find a place to gamble in any settlement, ship, or region. +1 Fate Point.

name: Snakeoil Seller
startingEquipment: 10 fake potions, 10 fake antidotes, packmule
feature: You can produce fake potions, poisons, and antidotes, etc.

name: Rake
startingEquipment: Small or medium blade of choice, set of fine clothes, game or instrument of choice
feature: You have lovers in various settlements and regions who will offer you food and shelter.

name: Poser
startingEquipment: Disguise tools, 10 forged organization signifiers
feature: There are numerous people who believe you are a part of several different organizations or represent powerful people.

name: Accuser
startingEquipment: 1 legal tome
feature: When you are injured, you may claim money from the local authorities and courts.

name: Priest
startingEquipment: Organization signifier, writ, religious or ideological tome, clergy robes, 1 servant
feature: You may conduct services within your religion, and gain access to relevant places of worship. +30 Deity Relationship Points.

name: Monk
details: [+30 Feat of Austerity, +17 Persevere, +8 Resist Supernatural]
startingEquipment: Organization signifier, writ, religious or ideological tome, clergy robes
feature: You have private access to monasteries of your order in various settlements and regions. +30 Deity Relationship Points.

name: Exorcist
details: [+30 Divine Intervention, +17 Sense Supernatural, +8 Resist Supernatural]
startingEquipment: Organization signifier, writ, religious or ideological tome, exorcism aids, clergy robes, 1 servant, 3 antidotes
feature: You may conduct exorcisms in various settlements, ruins, and places of worship in order to exert your religion’s influence in the area. +30 Deity Relationship Points.

name: Missionary
startingEquipment: Organization signifier, religious or ideological tome, staff, horse, or clergy robes
feature: Your religious organization will send aid or supplies if you are in peril. +30 Deity Relationship Points.

name: Paladin
startingEquipment: Organization signifier, writ, religious or ideological tome, horse, era and race-appropriate armor, 2 weapons of choice, clergy robes
feature: Supernatural beings and cultists of opposing religions generally flee from you outside of combat. +30 Deity Relationship Points.

name: Cultist
startingEquipment: Organization signifier, religious or ideological tome, small weapon of choice, light armor, clergy robes, 1 friend, 1 poison
feature: You have private access to safehouses among your cult that will aid you if you are able to carry out a goal of your deity. +30 Deity Relationship Points.

name: Musician
startingEquipment: Instrument of choice, a set of fine clothes
feature: You may perform music for a patron who will fund your endeavors.

name: Painter
startingEquipment: Painting tools, 1 artpiece
feature: You may paint for a patron who will fund your endeavors.

name: Novelist
startingEquipment: Unwritten book, 3 tomes of choice
feature: You write anonymous letters or stories that make the rounds in a certain settlement or region.

name: Poet
startingEquipment: 3 tomes of Poetry
feature: You may write poetry for a patron who will fund your endeavors.

name: Sculptor
startingEquipment: Sculpting tools
feature: You may sculpt for a patron who will fund your endeavors.

name: Architect
startingEquipment: 10 site maps, measuring tools, set of fine clothes
feature: You generally have a decent understanding of a building or dungeon’s layout, even if you’ve never been there before.

name: Professional Thief
details: [+30 Feat of Agility, +17 Conceal, +8 Gather Intelligence]
startingEquipment: 2 small weapons of choice, light armor, lockpicking kit, 3 site maps, 3 forged organization signifiers, disguise tools
feature: You are part of a thieves' guild that will aid you if you find places to rob.

name: Serial Killer
startingEquipment: Small weapon of choice, 1 poison. +1 Fate Point.
feature: When you are trying to kill someone, you automatically succeed at tracking them in settlements.

name: Organized Crime Boss
startingEquipment: Weapon of choice, light armor, 1 artifact, 3 precious gems, 3 henchmen, set of fine clothes, organization signifier
feature: You command an organized crime syndicate.

name: Raider/Pirate
startingEquipment: Weapon of choice, light armor, organization signifier
feature: You are part of a pirate or bandit organization that will aid you if you find settlements or ships to pillage. +1 Fate Point.

name: Saboteur
startingEquipment: Tinderbox, trap kit, 3 forged organization signifiers, disguise tools
feature: You are part of an organization or are hired by someone who will give supplies if you find important or infrastructural/military efforts to sabotage.

name: Anarchist/Revolutionary
startingEquipment: Religious or ideological tome, organization signifier, 1 friend
feature: You have safehouses in a region that will offer aid if you have committed crimes in the area. +1 Fate Point.

name: Bard
startingEquipment: 2 Instruments of choice, 1 friend
feature: You may perform at local inns, taverns, events for money.

name: Tumbler
details: [+30 Feat of Agility, +17 Perform, +8 Feat of Strength]
startingEquipment: Rope
feature: You may perform at local inns, taverns, events for money.

name: Magician
details: [+30 Feat of Agility, +17 Will Dakar, +8 Incite Fate]
startingEquipment: Cloak, game of choice, 2 joke items, 1 servant
feature: There are many people who believe your magic tricks are real. +1 Fate Point.

name: Trickster
startingEquipment: Game of choice, string, 1 joke item
feature: You may use perform in place of feat of agility and conceal.

name: Puppeteer
startingEquipment: Puppets, string
feature: You may use perform in place of feat of agility and conceal.

name: Jester
startingEquipment: 3 joke items, 1 friend, set of fine clothes
feature: You may make jokes at the expense of or belittle powerful figures without suffering organization consequences. +1 Fate Point.

name: Harvester
details: [+30 Feat of Strength, +17 Forage, +8 Small Blades]
startingEquipment: Small blade or large bearded weapon of choice, farming tools
feature: You can work for farmers or artisans for money.

name: Herder
startingEquipment: Long ranged weapon of choice, whistle, 1 antidote, tinderbox
feature: You can automatically find lost domestic animals.

name: Serf
startingEquipment: Tinderbox, farming tools
feature: When you commit crimes, you can blend into crowds in order to conceal.

name: Animal Trainer
startingEquipment: 1 horse, 6 trained dogs, 1 trained bird, or 1 exotic pet, 1 antidote
feature: Animals tend to trust you far more quickly and easily than is typical.

name: Miller
feature: You own a mill that produces steady income.

name: Butcher
startingEquipment: Butcher tools
feature: Meat you hunted does not spoil or go to waste, and you obtain maximum meat from hunted animals.

name: Hermit
startingEquipment: Tinderbox, hunting trap
feature: You know of secret public hiding spots in the wilderness. +1 Fate Point.

name: Alley
startingEquipment: 1 friend, tinderbox
feature: You know of secret public hiding spots in settlements. +1 Fate Point.

name: Poorhouse
feature: You have connections to informants in poor areas of settlements. +10 Deity Relationship Points. +1 Fate Point.

name: Petty Thief
startingEquipment: 1 precious gem, lockpicking tools, 1 friend
feature: You have connections to petty criminals in settlements. +1 Fate Point.

name: Sewer
feature: You know the layouts of sewers in settlements. +1 Fate Point.

name: Squatter
startingEquipment: Tinderbox
feature: You know of abandoned buildings in settlements. +1 Fate Point.

name: Forester
startingEquipment: Ranged weapon of choice, forested region map, appropriate scavenging tools, 3 hunting traps, tinderbox, 1 poison, 1 antidote
feature: You are unable to become lost in forested areas.

name: Fisher
startingEquipment: Fishing tools, bait
feature: You are always successful at and catch maximum weight fish when fishing.

name: Plains
startingEquipment: Horse or bird, spyglass, ranged weapon of choice, tinderbox, plains region map
feature: You are unable to become lost in plains areas.

name: Ratcatcher
startingEquipment: 3 hunting traps, 3 poisons, poison tools
feature: You automatically find pests and small animals.

name: Monster Hunter
startingEquipment: 1 artifact, 1 potion, weapon of choice, era and race appropriate armor, 1 antidote
feature: Your criticals are automatically 1 tier higher when fighting against creatures larger than yourself.

name: Bounty Hunter
startingEquipment: Bounty, site map, weapon of choice, light armor, horse, tinderbox
feature: You may always choose to deal nonlethal damage instead of lethal damage, regardless of how the damage is dealt.

name: Thermomancer
startingEquipment: 3 precious gems, 1 potion, 1 spell scroll, 1 friend or exotic pet, magical robe or hat, staff or wand, organization signifier, writ
feature: Ildakar Faculties Unlocked: Thermomancy. This faculty costs you -20% energy and action points to use.

name: Vivomancer
startingEquipment: 3 precious gems, 1 potion, 1 spell scroll, 1 friend or exotic pet, magical robe or hat, staff or wand, organization signifier, writ
feature: Ildakar Faculties Unlocked: Vivomancy. This faculty costs you -20% energy and action points to use.

name: Photomancer
startingEquipment: 3 precious gems, 1 potion, 1 spell scroll, 1 friend or exotic pet, magical robe or hat, staff or wand, organization signifier, writ
feature: Ildakar Faculties Unlocked: Photomancy. This faculty costs you -20% energy and action points to use.

name: Pneumancer
startingEquipment: 3 precious gems, 1 potion, 1 spell scroll, 1 friend or exotic pet, magical robe or hat, staff or wand, organization signifier, writ
feature: Ildakar Faculties Unlocked: Pneumancy. This faculty costs you -20% energy and action points to use.

name: Electromancer
details: [+30 Will Dakar, +17 Endure, +8 Feat of Agility]
startingEquipment: 3 precious gems, 1 potion, 1 spell scroll, 1 friend or exotic pet, magical robe or hat, staff or wand, organization signifier, writ
feature: Ildakar Faculties Unlocked: Electromancy. This faculty costs you -20% energy and action points to use.

name: Graviturgist
details: [+30 Will Dakar, +17 Academic Recall, +8 Feat of Agility]
startingEquipment: 3 precious gems, 1 potion, 1 spell scroll, 1 friend or exotic pet, magical robe or hat, staff or wand, organization signifier, writ
feature: Ildakar Faculties Unlocked: Graviturgy. This faculty costs you -20% energy and action points to use.

name: Dock Worker
details: [+30 Feat of Strength, +17 Small Bearded, +8 Forage]
startingEquipment: Rope
feature: You may perform labor for pay in coastal areas.

name: Processor
feature: You may perform labor for pay for farmers and artisans, and you can create textile goods.

name: Warehouse Worker
feature: You may perform labor for pay in settlements.

name: Builder
details: [+30 Feat of Strength, +17 Small Blunt, +8 Endure]
startingEquipment: Appropriate builder tools, small blunt weapon
feature: You may construct buildings and structures.

name: Plowhand
details: [+30 Feat of Strength, +17 Animal Husbandry, +8 Endure]
startingEquipment: Farming tools, tinderbox
feature: You may perform labor for pay for farmers.

name: Raker
startingEquipment: Cloak, settlement map, tinderbox
feature: You may perform labor for pay in sewers.

name: Guild Master
startingEquipment: 1 horse, 1 pack mule, 2 servants, 2 bodyguards, organization signifier, 3 sets of fine clothes
feature: You command a mercantile or trade guild.

name: Black Market Dealer
startingEquipment: 1 artifact, 1 potion, 1 spell scroll, 1 bodyguard, forged organization signifier
feature: You have private access to black markets in settlements and regions.

name: Innkeeper
startingEquipment: 1 servant, 1 bodyguard
feature: You own an inn that provides steady income.

name: Peddler
startingEquipment: Carriage, 2 horses, region map, tinderbox
feature: You know the overland routes between all settlements.

name: Bookkeeper
startingEquipment: 10 tomes of subject choice, 1 spell scroll
feature: You have private access to various organizations’ records and private offices.

name: Hawker
startingEquipment: Tent
feature: You may perform labor for pay in markets.

name: Knight
startingEquipment: Era and race appropriate armor, 2 weapons of choice, horse, religious or ideological tome, squire, organization signifier, set of fine clothes, writ
feature: You may perform quests for a higher noble than yourself to gain titles and land.

name: Baron
startingEquipment: Era and race appropriate armor, weapon of choice, tent, horse, packmule, 2 servants, 2 bodyguards, organization signifier, 3 sets of fine clothes, writ
feature: You command a barony and serve a higher noble than yourself to gain titles and land.

name: Landed Gentry
startingEquipment: Small or medium weapon of choice, tent, packmule, 1 servant, organization signifier, 3 sets of fine clothes, writ
feature: You command an estate.

name: Squire
startingEquipment: Light armor, weapon of choice, religious or ideological tome, organization signifier, set of fine clothes, tinderbox
feature: You serve under a knight or party member to gain titles and land (knighthood). +1 Fate Point.

name: Thuil
details: [+30 Incite Fate, +17 Deduce, +8 Resist Supernatural] Must be Thuilin or Ganzenonin
startingEquipment: organization signifier
feature: You have access to narrative ancillaries relating to Fireborn. You can see during Har'Rheunen without Ozoar. +30 Deity Relationship Points. +1 Fate Point.

name: Inheritor
startingEquipment: Packmule, 1 servant, organization signifier, 3 sets of fine clothes
feature: You are related to someone very powerful or rich who you will eventually take over for during some part of the campaign.

name: Psychometrist
startingEquipment: None
feature: Psionic Technique Tree, Unlocked: Psychometry, and 2 of the following: Claircognizance, Clairvoyance, Identify, Psychoscopy, or Track, and 1 additional psi-point.

name: Telekineticist
details: [+30 Psionic Technique, +17 Resist Psionics, +8 Feat of Strength]
startingEquipment: None
feature: Psionic Technique Tree, Unlocked: Telekinesis, and 2 of the following: Levitation, Psychokinesis, Dynakinesis, Psychometabolism, or Density, and 1 additional psi-point.

name: Telepath
startingEquipment: None
feature: Psionic Technique Tree, Unlocked: Telepathy, and 2 of the following: Pry, Sense Presence, Communicate, Interfere, or Interconnect, and 1 additional psi-point.

name: Hypnotist
startingEquipment: None
feature: Psionic Technique Tree, Unlocked: Hypnosis, and 2 of the following: Pathokinesis, Illusion, Possession, Mnokinesis, or Override, and 1 additional psi-point.

name: Dynakineticist
startingEquipment: None
feature: Psionic Technique Tree, Unlocked: Telekinesis, Dynakinesis, and 1 of the following: Shield, Field, or Force.

name: Illusionist
startingEquipment: None
feature: Psionic Technique Tree, Unlocked: Hypnosis, Illusion, and one of the following: Amplify I, Dampen, or Alter Illusion.

name: Rigger
details: [+30 Feat of Agility, +17 Feat of Strength, +8 Feat of Defiance]
startingEquipment: Small or medium weapon of choice, game of choice, rope

category: Climbing does not cost extra action or energy. +1 Fate Point.
name: Boatswain
startingEquipment: Carpentry tools, textile tools, rope making tools, measuring tools

category: You may perform labor for pay aboard ships. +1 Fate Point.
name: Captain
startingEquipment: Spyglass, exotic pet, small or medium weapon of choice, 1 artifact, game of choice, 1 friend, set of fine clothes, organization signifier

category: You command a crewed ship. +1 Fate Point.
name: Navy
startingEquipment: Weapon of choice, light armor, writ, organization signifier

category: You are part of a navy that you report to and will provide supplies for you in coastal or maritime areas if you are performing relevant tasks.
name: Navigator
startingEquipment: Navigation tools, 10 region maps

category: You cannot become lost at sea. +1 Fate Point.
name: Quartermaster
startingEquipment: Tool set of choice, rope, medical kit, tinderbox, cooking utensils

name: Rheunen Walker
startingEquipment: Weapon of choice, cloak, 10 region maps, 1 potion, organization signifier, writ, tinderbox
feature: You know of a secret passage in every region. You can see during Har'Rheunen without Ozoar.

name: Explorer
startingEquipment: Navigation tools, pack mule, exotic pet, rope, 10 region maps, tinderbox
feature: You know of a secret passage in every region.

name: Archaeologist
startingEquipment: Archaeologist tools, pack mule, artifact, rope, 10 site maps
feature: You know of a hidden ruin in every region.

name: Vagabond
startingEquipment: None
feature: You have a friend who can give aid and shelter in every region.

name: Exile
startingEquipment: None
feature: You have a particular people or organization you can perfectly replicate and that cannot be seen through (disguise-wise etc) by magic or other means. +1 Fate Point.

name: Pilgrim
details: [+30 Deduce, +17 Incite Fate, +8 Feat of Austerity]
startingEquipment: Religious or ideological tome, staff, tinderbox
feature: You may visit places of worship to vastly increase your relationship with a deity(s).

name: Soldier
startingEquipment: Weapon of choice, shield, era and race appropriate armor, organization signifier
feature: You are part of an army that you report to and will give aid and supplies if you are performing relevant tasks.

name: Guard
startingEquipment: Small, medium, or ranged weapon of choice, shield, era and race appropriate armor, organization signifier
feature: Criminal elements will generally flee from you outside of combat.

name: Barbarian
startingEquipment: Weapon of choice, light armor of choice, tinderbox, organization signifier
feature: You may use intimidate in place of perform and parley.

name: Gladiator
startingEquipment: Weapon of choice, light armor of choice
feature: You may use perform in place of battle. +1 Fate Point.

name: Officer
startingEquipment: Weapon of choice, era and race-appropriate armor, horse, writ, organization signifier
feature: You command a military unit and serve in a military to obtain a higher rank.

name: Scout
startingEquipment: Small or ranged weapon of choice, horse, spyglass, region map, organization signifier, tinderbox
feature: You have private access to military leaders and military informants relating to the movements of armies and raiders/pirates.

name: Addicted
details: You have an itch that cannot be scratched. A vice of yours or a substance you use controls your thoughts and emotions more than you do.

name: Aggressive
details: Fight first and ask questions later! You find it difficult to resist battle, and often, it seems like the best or only solution to a problem.

name: Arrogant
details: You are better than everyone else because of your status or talents. Those who belittle or slight you had better watch out.

name: Broken
details: Tough living ground you down. The life you’ve lived thus far has given you a serious physical or mental condition.

name: Cloistered
details: You don’t remember the last time you saw someone else. Your lifestyle has led you to be an awkward loner when out of your element.

name: Cold
details: Keep your friends close and your enemies closer. In your life, you’ve learned to trust your mind more than your heart.

name: Corrupt
details: It’s good to be the King! When in a position of power or authority, you cannot resist abusing or taking advantage of it to enrich yourself.

name: Craven
details: Life is too short. You avoid pain, danger, and confrontation whenever possible.

name: Cruel
details: If they wanted you to stop, they’d have asked. You go far and beyond what’s necessary when it comes to fights, disputes, and vengeance.

name: Eccentric
details: Nobody gets you, and that’s fine. You’re a strange person whom people find difficult to engage with, whether because of your demeanor or your interests.

name: Extravagant
details: You like nice things, and that’s just because you have high standards. You have lived a life of luxury and plenty that has led to your inability to cope with a substandard lifestyle.

name: Greedy
details: Enough is never enough! You always want more, whether it’s money, sex, status, or respect.

name: Guilty
details: What have you done? You’ve lived a life where you’ve had to do some nasty things, and they still haunt you.

name: Impatient
details: What are you waiting for? Time is of the essence, and you cannot stand it when people waste it.

name: Impulsive
details: Why not? If you want to do something, you have a tough time stopping yourself.

name: Incurious
details: Who cares? You keep your nose to the grindstone, and any attempt to sway you from your path is just an inane distraction.

name: Indecisive
details: Left or right? Any time you have to make a decision, it’s a tough decision, and you always overthink it.

name: Jealous
details: You are green with envy. Any time someone has more than you or is better at something you’re good at, you cannot stand it.

name: Lazy
details: Why bother? You avoid work and hard things at all costs.

name: Oblivious
details: Nothing ever happens. You have a terrible sense of self-awareness and situational awareness.

name: Out of Touch
details: The little people are back. Your lifestyle has either led to you being so far removed from people due to wealth and fame, or so far away that you don’t understand normal people.

name: Overzealous
details: You’re very enthusiastic, and that’s good! You believe in a cause, ideology, or organization so much, it’s caused you to hate your enemies with an unquenchable burning passion.

name: Paranoid
details: They’re watching you! You’ve made so many enemies throughout your life, they’re bound to come for you, and for all you know, they may be around the next corner.

name: Perfectionist
details: Practice makes perfect! You cannot settle for subpar work, and as such, take way too long to do things, and oftentimes throw out your work altogether to restart.

name: Power Hungry
details: Adûrun is ripe for the taking! You aspire to gain power, influence, and might at all costs.

name: Procrastinator
details: You can do it later. You always put things off until the consequences of ignoring them cannot be ignored.

name: Simple
details: What’re they even talking about? Things ought not be complicated, and so if it is, you refuse to or cannot understand complex issues or situations.

name: Stubborn
details: When you’re right, you’re right. Nobody else knows what they’re talking about, and you have to prove that to them.

name: Unhealthy
details: You hurt all over. Your lifestyle has led to a generally warped body, mind, social life, or spirit, and you refuse to do anything about it.

name: Unwise
details: You can just read about it. You are so wrapped up in your intellect or ideology, you’ve become unable to cope with the worldly.

name: Weak-Willed
details: You go with the flow. Anytime you are confronted with something difficult, you fold under the pressure.

name: Exiled
details: You did something or were accused of something so bad, you were exiled from your home or shunned by your community. [+5 Forage]

name: Debts
details: You incurred an enormous amount of debt and are either working to pay them off or attempting to escape from them. [+5 Trade]

name: Rumors
details: You heard some rumors or gossip about an opportunity or threat that would change your life. [+5 Gather Intelligence]

name: Destroyed Home
details: Your home was destroyed by natural disasters, conflict, or a supernatural phenomenon. [+5 Persevere]

name: Revenge
details: Someone ruined your life or destroyed someone or something precious to you, and you now seek vengeance. [+5 Track]

name: Following Dreams
details: You are simply following your dream or passion and have set out to achieve it. [+5 Incite Fate]

name: Accomplished Feat
details: You accomplished something very impressive and were either encouraged to achieve more or were pressured by your community or an outsider to continue with your talents and skills. [+5 Endure]

name: Vision
details: You had a vision, a revelatory experience, or a dream where life-changing or world-changing knowledge and insight were delivered unto you. [+5 Deduce]
